alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 3:01PM MDT until July 13 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Lincoln County in east central Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 300 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Karval, or 43 miles south of Limon, moving south at 25 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR SOUTHERN LINCOLN COUNTY AND WILD HORSE POINT. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Wild Horse Point around 320 PM MDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing destructive winds and large damaging hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
